entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
